agents.name: LangGraph Assistant
agents.description: A simple LangGraph agent powered by OpenAI that answers questions and assists with general tasks.

skills.name: General Assistant
skills.description: Answers questions and assists with general tasks using OpenAI
examples: What is the capital of France?

agents.name: MCP Tool Agent
agents.description: LangGraph agent that uses tools from the MCP server (add, greet, echo , just_fun_random) via mcp_registry and mcp_connector.

skills.name: MCP tools
skills.description: Use remote MCP server tools (add, greet, echo , just_fun_random) to answer questions
